altername_name: Populous II: Trials of the Olympian Gods
name: Two Tribes: Populous II
overview: Life itself becomes a game in which Good and Bad gods attempt to settle their differences. People and land are carefully created in minutes and then destroyed in seconds by all manner of natural and unnatural events such as plagues, tidal waves, lightning, storms, earthquakes and volcanoes. Tackle a series of 1000 increasingly challenging landscapes or create your own worlds... In Two Tribes: Populous II. The Mega Drive port of Populous II was only released in Europe, however plans were made to bring the game to North America as Populous II: Wrath of the Gods, or simply Wrath of the Gods. Though the North American version of the game never made it to store shelves, a prototype ROM has been found.
